doc.title: Mohityanchi Manjula
doc.plot: The year is 1654, and King Shivájí of Mahárásht.ra, India, is determined to annex the fortress of Jával.í. Bahirjí Náik, a master of disguise, gets the assignment. Meanwhile, a fearless and agile girl named Manjul.á Mohite becomes an object of obsession for Sir Kedárjí More of Jával.í, who attempts to kidnap her. Watch how Bahirjí and Manjul.á work together to frustrate Kedárjí and assimilate Jával.í into the independent kingdom in this epic film.
